content: शंखः --खं [शम्-ख <ls>Uṇ. 1. 102</ls>] {@--1@} The conch-shell, a shell; न श्वेतभावमुज्झति शखः शिखिभुक्तमुक्तोपि <ls>Pt. 4. 110</ls>; शंखान् दध्मुः पृथक् पृथक् <ls>Bg. 1. 18.</ls> {@--2@} The bone on the forehead; शंखांतरद्योति विलोचनं यत् <ls>Ku. 7. 33.</ls> {@--3@} The temporal bone. {@--4@} The part between the tusks of an elephant. {@--5@} A hundred billions. {@--6@} A military drum or other martial instrument. {@--7@} A kind of perfume (नर्खा). {@--8@} One of the nine treasures of Kubera. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon slain by Viṣṇu. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of the author of a Smṛti (mentioned in conjunction with लिखित <ab>q. v.</ab>).

शंखः --खं [शम्-ख <ls>Uṇ. 1. 102</ls>] {@--1@} The conch-shell, a shell; न श्वेतभावमुज्झति शखः शिखिभुक्तमुक्तोपि <ls>Pt. 4. 110</ls>; शंखान् दध्मुः पृथक् पृथक् <ls>Bg. 1. 18.</ls> {@--2@} The bone on the forehead; शंखांतरद्योति विलोचनं यत् <ls>Ku. 7. 33.</ls> {@--3@} The temporal bone. {@--4@} The part between the tusks of an elephant. {@--5@} A hundred billions. {@--6@} A military drum or other martial instrument. {@--7@} A kind of perfume (नर्खा). {@--8@} One of the nine treasures of Kubera. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon slain by Viṣṇu. {@--10@} <ab>N.</ab> of the author of a Smṛti (mentioned in conjunction with लिखित <ab>q. v.</ab>).
